channel.title: Help with question
channel.description:
I am trieng to figure out, whats the proper code for a question thing? I cant really explain it, but I am looking for were you start, it will ask you a question. Example::
[b] Do you have exp with other mopar servers [/b] [Question]
Yes[Answer one] No[A2] Hell ya[A3]
..
Also, how would i make them teleport you to certain places like YES = straight to regular spawn NO = TUTORIAL spawn HELL YA = super hard dunguen with 1 hp :P
---
All help is thanked, Please dont spam or say "ya, i wanted to know this too"

item.title: Help with question
item.dc:creator: @jujitsubb777 jujitsubb777
item.description:
@jujitsubb777 wrote:

I am trieng to figure out, whats the proper code for a question thing? I cant really explain it, but I am looking for were you start, it will ask you a question. Example::

Do you have exp with other mopar servers [Question]

Yes[Answer one]
No[A2]
Hell ya[A3]

…

Also, how would i make them teleport you to certain places like
YES = straight to regular spawn
NO = TUTORIAL spawn
HELL YA = super hard dunguen with 1 hp

All help is thanked, Please dont spam or say “ya, i wanted to know this too”
